snippet: The melting of a deep Sierra Nevada snowpack is turning rivers into rampaging torrents where 11 whitewater rafters have died in three weeks.    Most of the victims were rafting without professional guides. Two victims were commercial rafters. The ...
lead_paragraph: The melting of a deep Sierra Nevada snowpack is turning rivers into rampaging torrents where 11 whitewater rafters have died in three weeks. Most of the victims were rafting without professional guides. Two victims were commercial rafters. The toll includes two boys who used air mattresses.
abstract: Eleven whitewater rafters have died in three weeks in California rivers roiled by melting of deep Sierra Nevada snowpack; most victims were rafting without professional guides (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; 11 California Rafters Die As Snowmelt Roils Rivers
